## Host.shareContext() method

Set the object of shared values that all Guests can access via [GuestServer.sharedContext](./uix-guest.guestserver.sharedcontext.md)<!-- -->. This overwrites any previous object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
shareContext(context: SharedContextValues): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  context | [SharedContextValues](./uix-host.sharedcontextvalues.md) |  |

**Returns:**

void

## Example 1

Exposes `authToken` to all Guests. Guests can call `this.sharedContext.get('authToken')` to retrieve this value.

```javascript
host.shareContext({
  authToken: '82ba19b'
});
```

## Example 2

Overwrites the previous sharedContext, deleting `authToken` and providing `secret` and `auth` instead.

```javascript
host.shareContext({
  secret: 'squirrel',
  auth: false
});
```
